columns.name: count
columns.description: Number of unique strings for this tag

columns.name: filename
columns.description: Output path of .txt file containing tag strings

columns.name: inferredDatatype
columns.description: XSD primitive type inferred from the values

columns.name: tagRole
columns.description: User-defined semantic role of the tag

columns.name: stringRole
columns.description: User-defined semantic role of the string; defaults to 'LiteralValueString' for non-xsd:string types

tableSchema.description: Summary of tags and inferred datatypes from XML, for staging user-defined semantic roles
